briefdescription.para: Convert string representation (from command-line) to cmn_type_t.
In/Out: cmn normalization, which contains the cmn_mean and cmn_var)
In/Out: mfc[f] = mfc vector in frame f
In: if not FALSE, variance normalize the input vectors to have unit variance (along each dimension independently); Irrelevant if no cmn is performed
In: Number of frames of mfc vectors
